local_intent: Ensure gentle surface contact before the push by lowering until contact and verifying it, with one retry if needed.
assumptions: Tool yaw set to 90 and alignment done
Gripper is open and above the cloth
coherence_with_global: Implements the verify phase around LowerUntilContact from the GLOBAL_BT and checks ContactDetected; Retry provides recovery if contact is not sensed on first attempt.
